description: Lists the IAM roles that have the specified path prefix.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Discovering IAM roles helps adversaries understand their permissions and group memberships, enabling them to identify roles with excessive privileges that can be misused for unauthorized activities.
Listing IAM roles can reveal roles associated with various software applications, including security, administrative, and operational tools.
